name: MEC R-Evolution Heavy-Duty Waterproof Cycling Pants - Men's
categories: R-Evolution Heavy Duty Waterproof Cycle Pants
description:
These burly waterproof breathable cycling pants will keep you dry through your dark and stormy commutes. Bold reflective detailing enhances your visibility to other road users and a generous cut allows you to layer to suit the temperature. Zippered thigh vents allow you to quickly vent heat as you warm up, and ankle zips with reflective storm flaps allow for speedy changes when you reach your destination.Made of 3-layer nylon Pertex Shield+ waterproof-breathable fabric with a PU non-porous hydrophilic laminate.Fully taped seams and Durable water repellent treatment boosts the waterproofness of the fabric.Adjustable elastic waistband is smooth on the front for added comfort.Articulated knees for a full range of movement.Zippered leg vents have reflective trim.Ankle zips allow for easy on and off without removing cycling footwear.Reflective storm flap covers ankle zip for enhanced visibility and protection for the elements.Bottom hem has hook and loop closure.Reflective strips front and back.

Regular fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
